mapper.select:
SELECT /* selectBookDetail */ schedule.online_subject_schedule_id, contents.contents_id, contents.book_id,
book.book_thumbnail_file_id,
labelManage.label_manage_id, labelManage.label_title,
COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_CN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_STRE_COURS, COMTNFILEDETAIL.STRE_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_EXTSN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SIZE, COMTNFILE.CREAT_DT, COMTNFILEDETAIL.DOWNLOAD_CNT FROM online_subject_schedule schedule LEFT JOIN contents contents on schedule.contents_id = contents.contents_id LEFT JOIN book book on contents.book_id = book.book_id LEFT JOIN label_mapping labelMapping on labelMapping.label_domain_manage_id = 1 /* 1:책 */ and labelMapping.object_manage_id = book.book_id and labelMapping.delete_ornot = 'N' LEFT JOIN label_manage labelManage on labelManage.label_manage_id = labelMapping.label_manage_id and labelManage.label_domain_manage_id = labelMapping.label_domain_manage_id and labelManage.delete_ornot = 'N' LEFT JOIN COMTNFILE on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILEDETAIL.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND schedule.online_subject_schedule_id = #{onlineSubjectScheduleId}

SELECT /* selectLearningContents */ schedule.online_subject_schedule_id,
contents.contents_id as contents_contents_id, contents.contents_title, contents.inspection_status, contents.book_id,
book.book_title, book.book_thumbnail_file_id,
COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_CN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_STRE_COURS, COMTNFILEDETAIL.STRE_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_EXTSN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SIZE, COMTNFILE.CREAT_DT, COMTNFILEDETAIL.DOWNLOAD_CNT,
book.cate_id as book_cate_id,
book_cate.parents_id as book_cate_parents_id, book_cate.depth as book_cate_depth, book_cate.`order` as book_cate_order, book_cate.cate_title as book_cate_cate_title, book_cate.first_cate_title as book_cate_first_cate_title, book_cate.second_cate_title as book_cate_second_cate_title, book_cate.third_cate_title as book_cate_third_cate_title, book_cate.fourth_cate_title as book_cate_fourth_cate_title, book_cate.fifth_cate_title as book_cate_fifth_cate_title, book_cate.sixth_cate_title as book_cate_sixth_cate_title, book_cate.seventh_cate_title as book_cate_seventh_cate_title, book_cate.eight_cate_title as book_cate_eight_cate_title, book_cate.ninth_cate_title as book_cate_ninth_cate_title, book_cate.tenth_cate_title as book_cate_tenth_cate_title, book_cate.first_cate_id as book_cate_first_cate_id, book_cate.second_cate_id as book_cate_second_cate_id, book_cate.third_cate_id as book_cate_third_cate_id, book_cate.fourth_cate_id as book_cate_fourth_cate_id, book_cate.fifth_cate_id as book_cate_fifth_cate_id, book_cate.sixth_cate_id as book_cate_sixth_cate_id, book_cate.seventh_cate_id as book_cate_seventh_cate_id, book_cate.eight_cate_id as book_cate_eight_cate_id, book_cate.ninth_cate_id as book_cate_ninth_cate_id, book_cate.tenth_cate_id as book_cate_tenth_cate_id,
template_inst.template_inst_id, template_inst.template_id, template_inst.contents_id as template_inst_contents_id, template_inst.json, template_inst.`order` as template_inst_order, template_inst.type, template_inst.difficulty, template_inst.cate_id as template_inst_cate_id,
template.template_title,
template_inst_cate.cate_id as template_inst_cate_cate_id, template_inst_cate.parents_id as template_inst_cate_parents_id, template_inst_cate.depth as template_inst_cate_depth, template_inst_cate.`order` as template_inst_cate_order, template_inst_cate.cate_title as template_inst_cate_cate_title, template_inst_cate.first_cate_title as template_inst_cate_first_cate_title, template_inst_cate.second_cate_title as template_inst_cate_second_cate_title, template_inst_cate.third_cate_title as template_inst_cate_third_cate_title, template_inst_cate.fourth_cate_title as template_inst_cate_fourth_cate_title, template_inst_cate.fifth_cate_title as template_inst_cate_fifth_cate_title, template_inst_cate.sixth_cate_title as template_inst_cate_sixth_cate_title, template_inst_cate.seventh_cate_title as template_inst_cate_seventh_cate_title, template_inst_cate.eight_cate_title as template_inst_cate_eight_cate_title, template_inst_cate.ninth_cate_title as template_inst_cate_ninth_cate_title, template_inst_cate.tenth_cate_title as template_inst_cate_tenth_cate_title, template_inst_cate.first_cate_id as template_inst_cate_first_cate_id, template_inst_cate.second_cate_id as template_inst_cate_second_cate_id, template_inst_cate.third_cate_id as template_inst_cate_third_cate_id, template_inst_cate.fourth_cate_id as template_inst_cate_fourth_cate_id, template_inst_cate.fifth_cate_id as template_inst_cate_fifth_cate_id, template_inst_cate.sixth_cate_id as template_inst_cate_sixth_cate_id, template_inst_cate.seventh_cate_id as template_inst_cate_seventh_cate_id, template_inst_cate.eight_cate_id as template_inst_cate_eight_cate_id, template_inst_cate.ninth_cate_id as template_inst_cate_ninth_cate_id, template_inst_cate.tenth_cate_id as template_inst_cate_tenth_cate_id FROM online_subject_schedule schedule LEFT JOIN contents on schedule.contents_id = contents.contents_id LEFT JOIN book on contents.book_id = book.book_id LEFT JOIN COMTNFILE on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILEDETAIL.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN cate book_cate on book.cate_id = book_cate.cate_id LEFT JOIN template_inst on contents.contents_id = template_inst.contents_id AND template_inst.delete_ornot = 'N' LEFT JOIN template on template_inst.template_id = template.template_id LEFT JOIN cate template_inst_cate on template_inst.cate_id = template_inst_cate.cate_id WHERE 1=1 AND contents.contents_id = #{contentsId} AND contents.delete_ornot = 'N' ORDER BY template_inst.`order`
mapper.insert: INSERT /* insertLearningContentsHistory */ INTO contents_history ( online_subject_schedule_id, user_manage_id, start_date, end_date, summary_doing_drawing_file_id, summary_doing_voice_file_id, delete_ornot ) VALUES ( #{onlineSubjectScheduleId}, #{userManageId}, #{startDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{summaryDoingDrawingFileId}, #{summaryDoingVoiceFileId}, 'N' )

INSERT /* insertTemplateInstHistory */ INTO template_inst_history ( contents_history_id, template_inst_id, correctanswer_status, user_manage_id, delete_ornot ) VALUES
(
#{item.contentsHistoryId}, #{item.templateInstId}, #{item.correctanswerStatus}, #{item.userManageId}, 'N' )
mapper.select: select /* selectScore */ sum(score.assignment_score) as assignment_score, sum(score.calculation_score) as calculation_score, (sum(score.calculation_score) / sum(score.assignment_score))*100 as score_percent, score_cate.cate_id, score_cate.parents_id, score_cate.depth, score_cate.`order`, score_cate.cate_title, score_cate.first_cate_title, score_cate.second_cate_title, score_cate.third_cate_title, score_cate.fourth_cate_title, score_cate.fifth_cate_title, score_cate.sixth_cate_title, score_cate.seventh_cate_title, score_cate.eight_cate_title, score_cate.ninth_cate_title, score_cate.tenth_cate_title, score_cate.first_cate_id , score_cate.second_cate_id, score_cate.third_cate_id , score_cate.fourth_cate_id , score_cate.fifth_cate_id , score_cate.sixth_cate_id, score_cate.seventh_cate_id , score_cate.eight_cate_id , score_cate.ninth_cate_id , score_cate.tenth_cate_id FROM contents_history as contents_history left join template_inst_history as template_inst_history on contents_history.contents_history_id = template_inst_history.contents_history_id and template_inst_history.delete_ornot ='N' left join template_inst as template_inst on template_inst_history.template_inst_id = template_inst.template_inst_id left join online_subject_schedule as schedule on contents_history.online_subject_schedule_id = schedule.online_subject_schedule_id inner join question_score as score on schedule.online_subject_id = score.online_subject_id and template_inst_history.correctanswer_status = score.correctanswer_status and template_inst.cate_id = score.cate_id LEFT JOIN cate as score_cate on score.cate_id = score_cate.cate_id where contents_history.delete_ornot = 'N' and contents_history.contents_history_id =#{contentsHistoryId} group by score.cate_id;
